scripts.deploy-studio: yarn build-rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ bond-labs
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: yarn build-rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service bond-labs/bond-labs-rinkeby
scripts.deploy-goerli: yarn build-goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service bond-labs/bond-labs-goerli
